Additional build flags: /DHTTP_ONLY

lib/win32/libcurl_a_debug.lib:
  mode=static DEBUG=yes
  libcurl-vc-x86-debug-static-ipv6-sspi-winssl

lib/win32/libcurl_a.lib:
  mode=static
  libcurl-vc-x86-release-static-ipv6-sspi-winssl

lib/win64/libcurl_a_debug.lib:
  mode=static DEBUG=yes MACHINE=x64
  libcurl-vc-x64-debug-static-ipv6-sspi-winssl

lib/win64/libcurl_a.lib:
  mode=static MACHINE=x64
  libcurl-vc-x64-release-static-ipv6-sspi-winssl
